## Discussion

When the target entity is valid and has a [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/WorldComponent], the portal renders with the target entity and its hierarchy tree.

# targetEntity

**Instance Property**

The root entity for the portal’s target world.

## Declaration

```swift
var targetEntity: Entity? { get set }
```

## Discussion

When the target entity is valid and has a [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/WorldComponent], the portal renders with the target entity and its hierarchy tree.

When the target entity doesn’t have a [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/WorldComponent], the portal doesn’t render.
